speech: But remember, greatness is not for the faint-hearted.  It's for those who dare to step out of the shadows of their fears into the light of their potential.  Be that person.  Rise up.  Your destiny awaits.
asr_speech: But remember, greatness is not for the faint-hearted. It's for those who dare to step out of the shadows of their fears into the light of their potential. Be that person, rise up, your destiny awaits.
